script.line: I think it's gonna get me my dog back!
Me too, Prota. Where should we start putting them up?

then.line: Hmmm... I'm not sure.
What do you think?
Hmm. Well. The poster...kind of looks like something a kid would make.
So maybe your best bet is to show it to some kids.
Kids?
Yeah! Sure! You know kids. They're always pointing at dogs... Saying "DOG!"
Or "DOGGY!" or "DOGGO" or "PUP" or "PUPPER!" You know kids.
You're right!
If anybody's gonna spot Minty, it's the youthful eyes of our cutest generation.
Exactly!
Plus, if I go to the daycare, I can ask my Dad if he's seen her too.
Oh, right! Yeah! Two birds, one stone.
Hmmm... I'm not sure.
How about Doc Sandwich? Minty's a big fan.
And all the foot traffic means more eyes on the posters. I like it.
Perfect!
Although if I'm being honest, I don't even want to put this thing up.
What? You don't like it?!
Oh no, it's not that!
I just like it so much I feel like we're papering the town with free art!
Not to mention that anybody who sees this might start hunting for Minty themselves!
You don't seriously think someone would steal Minty, do you?
This dog could turn anybody into a multi-millionaire! Huge influencer potential.
If monetized correctly.
Who would monetize Minty?!
Only the most savvy, cunning, and well-connected folks in town...
You don't mean...
THE TEENS.
(Gasp!) But they're so cool!
"All the better to monetize you with, my dear."
Oh no, you're right. Okay. What if I get to them first? So they know she's mine.
I'll go to the skate park and get them on my side.
That way, they're friends, not foes. Or potential thieves.
Yeah! Yeah, that could work!

script.line: I'll put these up elsewhere and you head out! We'll cover more ground that way.
Perfect! We'll circle back on this later. See you, Besto!
You sure you're okay to do this solo? You're not...feeling confused?
It's fine! Got a little mixed up earlier, but I'm feeling right as snow!
That was a joke! I'm right as rain and I'm good to go alone.
Plus, you should probably get back to Marbels' lab as soon as you can.
I'm sure he could really use your help getting ready for tonight.
As long as you're going to be okay.
Good luck, Prota. I'm sure you'll find her soon.
Thanks to your help, I'm sure I will too. See you later, Besto!
